# Head of AML

## About Us
Travel Union is a digital banking platform offering payment and loyalty solutions for private consumers (with a focus on families with children) and businesses. We currently operate under an e-money license provided by the Bank of Lithuania. The license can also be used across the European Economic Area (EEA). In January 2021 Travel Union was granted Mastercard Affiliate license.

Travel Union’s integrated offering includes: myTU mobile banking app, online banking and payment system for businesses and a unified loyalty program.

Our team is expanding and we’re looking for the Head of AML. If you’re interested, APPLY now! [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu).

## Job Summary
Identify, assess, advise on, monitor, test and report on AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance risk to ensure that Travel Union and its subsidiaries (hereinafter – TU) complies with the anti-money laundering/counter terrorist financing, international sanctions laws, rules and regulations applicable to the business activities.

Responsible for managing the department’s everyday work, improving job procedures/work processes and ensuring cooperation with other structural units within area of Department’s activity, describing and implementing compliance best practices.

Head of AML Department will advise on AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance to the Management Board and other relevant staff and will establish policies and processes to manage  AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance risks; He/She is also in charged that all relevant regulatory technical standards by EBA, ECB, ESMA and other competent authorities are implemented timely.

## Head of AML will take care of:
- business partnership and leadership on all AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance matters;
- providing timely and accurate advice in support of the business strategy;
- review of all significant business activities for potential AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance risk and required mitigation measures;
- design and implementation of remediation plans and activities to correct any locally identified breakdown in  AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance control; preparedness and coordination to meet and report on  AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance with the requirements of local and international regulators in respect of aspects of our operations;
- participation in  AML/CTF and international sanctions risk assessments.
- advise the management body on measures to be taken to ensure  AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance with applicable laws, rules, regulations and standards, and should assess the possible impact of any changes in the legal or regulatory environment on the institution’s activities and  AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance framework.

## Head of AML related functions:
- using specialist knowledge and experience to provide expert support for the financial institution's policy and oversight activities, related to AML/CTF and international sanctions, including advising on and implementing technical standards, guidelines, recommendations and opinions;
- analysing and advising on the interpretation and application of existing and proposed sectoral legislation, related to AML/CTF and international sanctions;
- liaising with external stakeholders such as competent authorities, Lithuania’s and EU institutions, agencies and bodies regarding AML/CTF and international sanctions compliance issues ;
- executing other related tasks as sought by the CEO.

## In addition Head of AML:
- Responsible for the quality and deliveries within area of responsibility,
- Responsible for organizing work of Department, including resource and tasks planning, follow up and delegation,
- Responsible for dialogue with employees, appraisals, coaching and mentoring employees, development initiatives and social relationships within TU according to our values,
- Responsible for preparation of internal procedures and documentation within area of responsibility including improving quality and efficiency of department’s activity.

## General Requirements
- Excellent written and verbal skills in both English and Lithuanian (other languages are a plus)
- A degree in law, management, business administration or economics and at least 5 years relevant working experience
- Experience in the financial services sector
- Ability to complete all forms and meet the requirements of a Key Function Holder of a Financial Market Participant supervised by the Bank of Lithuania.

## Other key competencies:
- Operationalize Compliance
- Controls & Process improvement, Build Positive Ethics culture
- Training and Facilitation
- Executive Communication

## Needed  qualifications:
- Proven operational & management skills in an evolving organization.
- Excellent communication and relationship management skills
- Experience in working with various credit and financial institutions.
- Tech attributes is a benefit as the company will use various systems.
- Reporting to Executive members, Directors and key staff throughout the company.
- Representing the company in regulator matters in regulator meetings.
- Experience of management reporting, investigation and / or auditing

**Salary:** 5,000-7,000 euro (brutto)

Please submit your application by email: [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu)

By sending your CV, you agree to UAB "Travel Union" [Candidate Policy Notice](https://mytu.lt/teisine-informacija?document=CP).

_data.text:
# Senior Mobile App Developer

## About Us
Travel Union is a digital banking platform offering payment and loyalty solutions for private consumers (with a focus on families with children) and businesses. We currently operate under an e-money license provided by the Bank of Lithuania. The license can also be used across the European Economic Area (EEA). In January 2021 Travel Union was granted Mastercard Affiliate license.

Travel Union’s integrated offering includes: myTU mobile banking app, online banking and payment system for businesses and a unified loyalty program.

We’re looking for a Senior Mobile App Developer to join our team. If you’re interested, APPLY now! Send us your CV to [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu) and join our growing team.

## Responsibilities
Required knowledge and skills:
- Ensuring the best performance and user experience of the application
- Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
- Writing clean, readable, and testable code
- Design features and interfaces to improve user experience
- Liaise with team to plan app improvements

## Requiremenets
- Extensive knowledge about the full process of mobile app development: from the first line of code to publishing in stores
- Experience in a similar role would be an advantage
- Experience with iOS
- Experience with Android app development would be an advantage
- Experience with Flutter framework would be an advantage

## Benefits:
- Motivating salary;
- Opportunity to grow with an innovative FinTech start-up
- Excellent work conditions and flexible working hours
- A professional and friendly team that is keen to share their knowledge

Salary 4000-7000 Eur gross monthly based on experience.

Please submit your application by email: [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu)

By sending your CV, you agree to UAB "Travel Union" [Candidate Policy Notice](https://mytu.lt/teisine-informacija?document=CP).

_data.text:
# Sukčiavimo ir AML rizikų (monitoring) ekspertas/projektų vadovas(-ė), kuriai(m) įdomu:

- būti proceso (finansinių nusikaltimų prevencijos, transakcijų stebėsenos) šeimininke(u)
- paprastinti, skaitmeninti, optimizuoti ir tobulinti procesus
- mokėjimo sukčiavimų bei kitų sukčiavimų atvejų identifikavimas, vidinių tyrimų atlikimas
- transakcijų tikrinimas ir monitoringas
- atlikti ne tik rutinines, bet ir sudėtingas užduotis

## Ką mes turime/siūlome:
- dinamišką ir įdomų darbo pobūdį, bei aplinką kurioje gali greitai augti. Nuo finansinių nusikaltimų sistemų kūrimo, veiklos modelių ir procesų kūrimo iki analitinių metodų, pagrįstų didžiaisiais duomenimis, vystymo ir nustatymo;
- pagrįstą verslo modelį ir profesionalų komandą, galimybę daryti svarbią įtaką visai organizacijai. Jokios aukštos rizikos ir iki galo nesuprantamų veiklų;
- pažangias IT sistemas - automatinius AML/CTF scoringą ir onboardingą (jei nėra high risk faktorių), integruotą monitoring platformą real time klientų bei transakcijų screeninimui, bei automatinį transakcijų monitoringą;
- Šiandienines rinkos sąlygas atitinkantį atlygį, opcionų programą, mokymų programą;
- DUK, priklausomai nuo kvalifacijos, 2500-4000 EUR/mėn. (brutto).

## Jei:
- turi 2-3 m. Monitoring/AML officer patirties finansų įstaigoje (privalumas Fintech, FSI)
- turi aukštąjį išsilavinimą
- pasižymi proaktyvumu, analitinėmis savybėmis (atidumas detalėms)
- laisvai kalbi anglų kalba (lenkų, ispanų, vokiečių, kalba būtų privalumas)
- esi smalsus(-i) ir drąsus(-i) klausti nepatogių klausimų

Siųskite savo CV: [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu)

Siųsdami savo CV, sutinkate su UAB "Travel Union" [Kandidatų Privatumo Politika](https://mytu.lt/teisine-informacija?document=CP).

_data.text:
# Teisininkas (-ė) / Vyresnysis teisininkas (-ė) (įmonių ir finansinių paslaugų teisė)

## Jei:
- turi patirties banke, FinTech, finansinių paslaugų sektoriuje, įmonių teisėje
- esi kvalifikuotas teisininkas, turintis 4-7 m. patirtį
- esi pasirengęs spręsti klausimus savarankiškai ir komandoje
- turi gerą supratimą apie finansinių paslaugų reguliavimo lauką ir paslaugas
- gebi teikti gaires ir rekomendacijas dėl taisomųjų veiksmų ar rizikos mažinimo strategijų ir užtikrinti tinkamą jų įgyvendinimą
- pasižymi proaktyvumu ir stipriomis kiekybinės/kokybinės analizės savybėmis
- aukšti etikos standartai tau yra kasdienybė

## Ką reikės daryti?
- teikti teisinius  patarimus, struktūrizuojant ir konsultuojant organizacijos darbuotojus, įskaitant dalyvavimą rengiant atitinkamus reguliuojamo subjekto dokumentus, derybas su partneriais ir paslaugų teikėjais
- rengti sutartis
- bendrauti ir sąveikauti su kitais departamentais, teikiant jiems teisinę pagalbą
- stebėti reguliavimo pokyčius bei juos įgyvendinti

## Ką mes turime/siūlome:
- pagrįstą verslo modelį ir profesionalų komandą. Jokios aukštos rizikos ir nesuprantamų veiklų
- pažangias IT sistemas  ir FinTech dvasią atitinkančią dinamiką
- pasidalinimą įžvalgomis, patirtimi ir žiniomis bei visapusišką paramą
- šiandienines rinkos sąlygas atitinkantį atlygį, opcionų programą, tęstinių, apmokamų mokymų programą
- suteiksim visus įrankius ir lankstumą tam, kad taptum geriausia savo paties versija ir atliktum reikšmingą vaidmenį organizacijoje

**Darbo užmokestis priklausomai nuo kvalifikacijos:** 5,000-7,000 euro (brutto)


Siųskite savo CV: [cv@travelunion.eu](mailto:cv@travelunion.eu)

Siųsdami savo CV, sutinkate su UAB "Travel Union" [Kandidatų Privatumo Politika](https://mytu.lt/teisine-informacija?document=CP).
